dmca.title: DMCA Notice - IIPHOnline.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Rick Smith [mailto:rick.smith@synergy-computing.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, June 01, 2005 11:12 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Notice - IIPHOnline.com
Importance: High

June 1, 2005

Copyright & Intellectual Property Agent for Notice George Poletes
ThePlanet.com
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110, Dallas TX 75207 Via Fax and Email
214.782.7756, copyright@theplanet.com

Iiphonline.com copied parts of our customer service policies, verbatim.
Their policies need to be written from the ground-up on their own, not
changing a few words that they copied from our copyrighted site.
Efforts to have them fix the problem with a friendly email have not been
successful.

The items were copied from us, without question.  I have more than a good
faith belief that the disputed use is not authorized by the copyright or
intellectual property holder owner (us), its agent or the law.  

I swear that the above information is correct, under penalty of perjury, and
that I am authorized to act on the copyright on the owner's behalf.
The owner is Synergy Computing Business Group, Inc., I am the president and
sole officer.

Please rectify the situation immediately by having them remove the items.
Every day the offending material is online causes us material harm.  Please
notify me when it has been resolved.  The infringing items
follow:

http://www.iiphonline.com/shipping.php

"The majority of our products are in stock unless otherwise stated on the
site.

Most items ship within 1 business day with many items shipping the same
business day if ordered by Noon EST. If for some exceptional reason we can
not ship within 2 business days, we will notify you as soon as possible.

We are located on the east coast. UPS Transit time can be up to 5 Business
days (1 week) to west coast destinations.
Business days are Monday through Friday. If you need an product by a certain
date, please ask! send us a line and we 'll be glad to help."

The only word transposed on their site was from East to West. 


Sincerely,
//Richard A. Smith//
Richard A. Smith
President
Synergy Computing Business Group, Inc.
DBA Chef's Resource.com
22732 Granite Way, Suite B
Laguna Hills CA 92653
(949) 581-3797 (x381).  Fax 581-9503
